allow: Bash(python -c " import json with open\(''api-1.json'', ''r''\) as f: data = json.load\(f\) for path, details in data.get\(''paths'', {}\).items\(\): if ''sequence'' in path or ''image'' in path or ''camera'' in path: methods = list\(details.keys\(\)\) if ''get'' in methods: summary = details[''get''].get\(''summary'', ''''\) print\(f''{path:40s} - {summary}''\) ")
